body.name: 12V 4Pin PWM & 5V 3Pin ARGB with SATA 15Pin Power 2-in-1 Hub 6 Way Sync CPU Cooling Fan Addressable RGB Lighting PCB Splitter for Extended Motherboard Interface -Black Compatible With Desktop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 36 mins
FREE pickup Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Wednesday, February 14. Order within 12 hrs 36 mins
features: This is ARGB PWM 2-in-1 6 way hub. Up to 6 sets of Addressable RGB (5V 3pin) plugs and PWM (12V 4pin) plugs to meet your needs of connecting more devices. Support simultaneous startup of 6 way fans, ARGB is all synced between all fans, one setting applies to all fans (speed and color).

This CPU Cooling SATA Hub is powered by SATA 15PIN, which can simultaneously supply power to the fan and 5V 3 pin ARGB products. The motherboard has no power supply burden and can maintain a stable output even at full load.

The ARGB of this hub is 5V 3-pin. This type of fan can control a single lamp bead, and realize the effects of running water lamp, splicing and displaying text patterns through programming. Only compatible with 3pin 5V addressable RGB headers or controllers, don't connect to 12V RGB components, otherwise it might burn out.

The black hub is perfectly integrated with chassis. Mini and compact, which effectively saves your space, makes cable management easier, and the inside of the chassis is tidy. The adhesive on the back can be used to fix the hub in the chassis, tool-free installation, and not easy to drop.

The PWM ARGB hub is equipped with two connecting cables. Both length of the wires is 53 cm. The red port on the hub is a professional port for the CPU fan. Gold-plated pins, solid materials, strong and durable.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 487 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PWM ARGB 2-In-1 6 Channel Hub With SATA 15Pin Power Supply This is a PWM ARGB 2-in-1 6 channel hub with SATA 15Pin power supply that can supply power to the fan and ARGB at the same time. 6-channel 12V 4Pin PWM interface and 6-channel 5V 3Pin ARGB interface start at the same time, centralized control and speed regulation. Extend the motherboard interface of the chassis to solve the problem of insufficient motherboard interfaces. It is widely used in PC computer water cooling systems and multiple RGB lighting controls. Supports PWM function and automatic fan speed adjustment. The package contains 2 connecting wires, both the length of which is 53CM, and the connecting wires are automatically locked with the hub plate socket, so that the connection is tight and does not fall off. This red 4PIN interface is a dedicated interface for the CPU fan, and these black 4PIN interface is a regular PWM fan interface. Make sure that each interface and pin are inserted smoothly when connecting.

12V 4Pin PWM & 5V 3 Pin ARGB Features *The main board ARGB (3PIN) lighting control interface can be expanded to 6 to centrally control multiple RGB lighting devices *The motherboard PWM speed control interface can be expanded to 6, and the PWM speed control of multiple 12V 4PIN fans can be concentrated Fan Hub Specification Fan PWM ports: 6 (4PIN) Symphony light control ports: 6 (3PIN ARGB) Power supply interface: SATA PWM Rated Voltage: 12V Rated Light Voltage: 5V Power Supply Safety Current: 4.5A Hub size: 99×61×12MM Package weight: 45g Package Includes PWM ARGB 2-in-1 6 Way Hub*1 Cable for Hub*2 English Manual*1

Installation Introduction: 1.Suitable for 12V 4PIN fan PWM speed regulation (3PIN fans can also be connected, but no PWM speed regulation function) 2.Insert the IDE interface of the computer motherboard power supply into the IDE power supply interface of the extender 3.The PWM cable is connected to the CPU fan socket of the motherboard. The computer CPU fan must be connected to the red 4PIN fan socket of the extender 4.Connect the ARGB cable to the motherboard. 5.Fix the extender on the inner wall of the chassis by glue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very night little fan hub for rigs without headers
reviews.reviewText: I had an older computer I slapped together and found it only had 2 total fan headers. So I pick this up to of course, correct that issue. This was super easy to use and did its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Work perfect and easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My Honest Review.
reviews.reviewText: Product was great! My fans and ARGB are working great. Although I must say the 2 Pin ARGB Connector had bended pretty easily when I was connecting it. I got scared, but ultimately it ended up working fine still. And its so rare to find an ARGB and PWM fan hub that isn't over-expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Work well easy to install, comes with a bit of a magnet in back so it can stick on without using the double-sided tape. Makes the PC look a lot cleaner without using all the fan headers, the RBG can be controlled through this. So you can use the software you want. I will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars ARGB pins dont hold the connectors. They just fall off
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use with a set of Lian Li ST 120 3 Pack. The Hub from Lian Li, arrived with a transistor broken off the board, so I ordered this hub to use with the fans and the ARGB. The Lian Li 4 pin connectors, just arent held by these pins. They fall right off if.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worked well all my fans 4 pins fit nicely. Was easy to install and looked good in my case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow it works
reviews.reviewText: What a great little gizmo for adding ARGB lights to your computer it comes with a great amount Fans/ argb controllers and it has a magnet/ sticky adhesive but do be careful not to move the metal stick out it can be a bit brittle other than that it’s awesome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: fan works but lights still did not light up, was the wrong thing make sure next time, if your motherboard dose have a 3 pin ARGB, You will need to buy a Computer Fan Temperature ARGB Controller Integrator, Remote Control Computer ARGB Light Change Adapter, 8 PWM Fan Speed Controller Ports, 10. 5V ARGB Ports
Works as it should, appears to be good quality, will be buying again for other builds👍
Excellente alternative pour ceux qui non pas un motherboard RGB compatible
CPU fan pins should be on opposite side from sata power plug as per the design of most cases out there.

reviews.reviewTitle: PWM function does not work, ARGB work fine atm
reviews.reviewText: I got this product since it has a combination of both Fans and RGB headers eliminating the need to have multiple ARGB Led ports on the motherboard.Though this does work but the fans do not follow PWM and fans work at 100% fan speed all the time. I ended up using this one as a ARGB hub and I have another hub for PWN fans.Overall if you are looking for PWM Hub, maybe stay away from this. This does not work as advertised (atleast the product that I received).
Some of the pins arrived bent, the adhesive doesn't stick very well
